xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 7 Kusalattika, Piṭṭhiduka » 7.2 Kusalattika, Bhāvanāyapahātabbaduka » 7.2.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
Kusalattika, Piṭṭhiduka
Kusalattika, Bhāvanāyapahātabbaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
6.
1541Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1542Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1543(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
7.
1544Kusalaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1545Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi…pe…  pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
